title: Keyword-Based Cluster Analysis Design Workshop for STEAM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational methodologies and mathematical subject knowledge
context.additional_context: Strengthening data-driven design competencies for pre-service teachers to integrate STEAM approaches into mathematics education.

learning_goals: Learners can derive STEAM education trends by interpreting keyword frequency and cluster analysis results from the Scopus database
Learners can analyze associations between six clusters generated by Vosviewer and design mathematics curriculum integration plans
Learners can develop mathematics STEAM lesson modules using core keywords such as 'transdisciplinary' and 'instructional design'
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
